Events.Text: Explain the general situation to the robot and ask some question. [instruction 1 of 3]

Scenario.UserTask: The life support on your spaceship is failing! To save the lives of the crew, the ship's repair-robot has to get into the engineering deck, which is sealed due to a lack of air. Help the robot to enter the engineering deck! It has to temper with the lock (manufactured by 'Diebold') and swap the positions of the Yellow cable and the Red cable. It already reached the door.
Scenario.WizardTask: Act as the spaceship's onboard robot and help the user recover the life support.
